name: MetaDeploy
description: Web-based tool for installing Salesforce products

DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Heroku proxies web requests and Django needs to be configured to allow the forwards

DJANGO_ADMIN_URL.description: The url path to the admin section of the site

ADMIN_API_ALLOWED_SUBNETS.description: Comma-separated list of IPv4 networks which will have Django admin access

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key used to provide cryptographic signing

DJANGO_HASHID_SALT.description: Salt used to hash IDs that get exposed publicly

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The AWS Access Key ID for S3 storages (optional).

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The AWS Secret Access Key for S3 storages (optional)

AWS_BUCKET_NAME.description: The S3 bucket name to use for S3 storages (optional)

SENTRY_DSN.description: Sentry DSN for error reporting (if not using Heroku Sentry buildpack).

SFDX_CLIENT_ID.description: The client id (consumer key) for the connected app used to auth with Salesforce.

SFDX_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret (consumer secret) for the connected app used to auth with Salesforce.

SFDX_CLIENT_CALLBACK_URL.description: The callback URL used for OAuth callbacks, must be in the form of fqdn, AllAuth adds what it needs. e.g. https://metadeploy-staging.herokuapp.com/

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: App ID of the GitHub app that will be used to read repositories from GitHub

GITHUB_APP_KEY.description: Private key of the GitHub app that will be used to read repositories from GitHub

DB_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A key for encrypting using cryptography.fernet. Generate using cryptography.fernet.Fernet.generate_key
